name: Hug
entries: When you take the Hug action, you use at least one free hand to embrace one willing creature in a comforting hug. If that creature is {@condition frightened}, and the cause of that condition allows them to make a saving throw to end the effect, that creature may use their reaction to attempt a saving throw.
This saving throw attempt does not count against any limit on attempts.
Once you {@action Hug|zorq} a creature, that creature cannot benefit again from the effect of a {@action Hug|zorq} while the cause of their {@condition frightened} condition remains the same.
